mapper.select: select A.*, u.name from ( SELECT sum(rr.reward_money) AS totalMoney, rr.user_id AS user_id FROM recommend_record rr WHERE rr.is_refund = - 1 GROUP BY rr.user_id ) A LEFT JOIN user u ON A.user_id = u.id order by A.totalMoney desc
